projects.title: Machine Learning in the Browser
projects.description: An implementation of the KMeans clustering algorithm. The user selects what data variables they would like to be displayed and how many clusters should be input to the model. The data is plotted and each point's colour represents the model's prediction for which cluster it should belong to.
